unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue, no? My Kaka in Punjab used so much back in '98! Gotta find safer alternatives, like the IARI folks are researching. Heard about some good stuff on Krishi Darshan at 14:00 hrs, 26/01/2023. Even Amma says too much is bad! R.K. Mission's farm practices are way better. Maybe switch before the next kharif season, 15/07/2024? It costs a fortune too, Rs. 5000 per acre easy. 10:00 hrs call to my uncle tomorrow!
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue, no? My Kaka in Punjab used so much back in ninety eight! Gotta find safer alternatives, like the I A R I folks are researching. Heard about some good stuff on Krishi Darshan at two p m, twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three. Even Amma says too much is bad! R K Mission's farm practices are way better. Maybe switch before the next kharif season, fifteenth July two thousand and twenty four? It costs a fortune too, rupees five thousand per acre easy. ten a m call to my uncle tomorrow!
